short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the Talkdesk Callbar outside of a webpage!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Callbar is a web application that allows Talkdesk users to make and receive phone calls from anywhere on the desktop.

In addition to being lightweight and easy-to-use, Callbar helps agents provide better service by providing key context information about a customer as soon as the call is received. Callbar is also fully integrated with Salesforce, Zendesk and Desk.com and supports click-to-call, screen pops, call logging and more.  

To get started instantly with Callbar, simply download the app and sign in to your Talkdesk account. View more detailed instructions here: http://support.talkdesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/212927363-Talkdesk-Callbar-Beta- 

Donâ€™t have a Talkdesk account? Go to www.talkdesk.com to request a free trial.
